getBlockAvailability.description: Returns a list of hotels that have availability in the given period. More hotels means more processing time, so making your input variables as specific as possible (eg. don't check multiple {city_ids}, but use pre-filtered {hotel_ids} instead) will result in faster availability pages. NB there's a limit of 1000 hotels that can be processed at a time.

arrival_date.description: The arrival date. Must be within 360 days in the future.

departure_date.description: The departure date. Must be later than {arrival_date}. Must be between 1 and 30 days after {arrival_date}. Must be within 360 days in the future.

hotel_ids.description: Limit the result to these hotels.

languagecodes.description: Specify the language for: block_id, policies, room texts and hotel descriptions. Note: not all text is translated in all languages.

detail_level.description: Block's information detail level. If set to 1 returns policy, photos and texts* information per block. This parameter cannot be set to 1 if hotel_ids is greater than 1. A list of currently possible policies can be found https://xml.booking.com/affiliates/documentation/xml_getblockavailability.html#C01.

getHotelAvailability.description: Returns a list of hotels that have availability in the given period. More hotels means more processing time, so making your input variables as specific as possible (eg. don't check multiple {city_ids}, but use pre-filtered {hotel_ids} instead) will result in faster availability pages. NB there's a limit of 1000 hotels that can be processed at a time.

arrival_date.description: The arrival date. Must be within 360 days in the future.

departure_date.description: The departure date. Must be later than {arrival_date}. Must be between 1 and 30 days after {arrival_date}. Must be within 360 days in the future.

countrycodes.description: Limit the result list to the specified country.

city_ids.description: Limit the results to these cities.

classes.description: Limit the result list to these classifications.

hotel_ids.description: Limit the result to these hotels.

currency_code.description: Returns the price in this currency, in addition to the hotel currency

offset.description: Where in the resulting list to start. This can be used together with {rows} to get the data in parts.

rows.description: The maximum number of entries to return. This can be used together with {offset} to get the data in parts.
